DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine safety efficacy G-CSF-mobilized autologous peripheral blood mononuclear cell injection ischemic limbs patient critical limb ischemia .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Chronic Critical Limb Ischemia With G-CSF-mobilized Autologous Peripheral Blood Mononuclear Cells
DOC.criteria: Patients critical limb ischemia confirm toe pressure , ABI , TCOM Levels arterial occlusion femoropopliteal tibioperoneal occlusion Poor distal artery runoff Age 1870 year Planned major amputation within 4 week Receive blood component within 4 week Acute myocardial infarction severe valvular heart disease renal failure liver failure Cancer Hypercoagulable state Severe infection Pregnancy
